messages.message: Iâ€™ve noticed we have no way to delete an account. I would assume people would want a way to remove themselves from aihub all together
We ask users to email us if they want to delete the account. This is included in our policy docs @Chris

Correct. Section 3(b) of our AI Hub Terms of Use, "(b) Content Deletion. You may delete your Content at any time from within AI Hub, and you may also request that your Content or account be deleted by submitting a written request to <mailto:privacy@instabase.com|privacy@instabase.com> in accordance with the instructions set forth in our Services Privacy Policy. We may delete or disable Content stored on our servers that is alleged to be illegal or infringing third party rights in our sole discretion. Unless otherwise notified in writing, your Content will be retained as long as you have an active AI Hub account."
That said, a platform-based "delete my account" feature is on the roadmap.
